attributes.action: reward the people of wootton bassett with a statue or monument for representing the people of great britain  in welcoming back the fallen soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every time a fallen soldier is brought back the people of wootten bassett line the streets,as most of the country are not able to attend we should give thanks to those who do attend with a statue or monument for representing the rest of us in our appreciation for our brave soldiers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to consider signing this existing petition:  
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WoottonBassett/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
